structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Reverse Mortgage Loans On Residential Property; Requirements
law.text: No mortgagee shall make a reverse mortgage loan on residential property except in accordance with sections 7 and 7A of chapter 167E. For the purposes of this section, the term “residential property” shall mean a 1 to 4 family dwelling owned and occupied in whole or in part by the mortgagor and located in the commonwealth.
